title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Taxiways - Navigating using the markings
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how to navigate your way through the taxiways on an airport. In this example we will start from a parking spot at Charles de Gaulle (LFPG) airport and just got permission to taxi to the runway and hold short.
